subject: RE: Parallel execution (was: Re: [junit] Does JUnit 4 now support dependencies?)
msgSnippet: ... A few years back, I used the ActiveTestSuite for JUnit 3.  I can t remember who wrote that, but it was awesome. Todd.
messageBody:
> FYI, We're looking at parallel execution as a baked-in
> optional feature in JUnit {4.n | n >= 6}. We'd love to hear
> early experience reports from people who have already
> extended JUnit for parallel execution. Thanks,

A few years back, I used the ActiveTestSuite for JUnit 3. I can't
remember who wrote that, but it was awesome.


Todd.
